title: Sen. Jim Justice, wife to pay $5.1M in back taxes to settle IRS suit
shortDescription: WV Republican Sen. Jim Justice, his wife, Cathy Justice agreed to pay over $5 million in unpaid federal income tax liabilities dating back to 2009.

title: Trump in Palm Beach: A look at his Thanksgiving visits as president
shortDescription: Thanksgiving traditionally marks the kickoff to the social season in Palm Beach.

title: See which endangered species could be more at risk under Trump plan
shortDescription: The Trump administration has moved to roll back protections under the Endangered Species Act. See what animals advocacy groups say could be at risk.

title: Watch live as Trump pardons Thanksgiving turkeys
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is set to pardon two turkeys, Waddle and Gobble, at the White House before Thanksgiving.

title: Trump order boosts AI companies with federal data sharing, computing
shortDescription: Trump's executive order creates the Genesis Mission, which the administration describes as a major “marshalling of federal scientific resources.”

title: President Trump proposes 50-year mortgage
shortDescription: Donald Trump proposed a 50-year mortgage as a way to tackle the affordability crisis, but not everyone thinks that's a good idea.

title: White House Christmas tree arrives
shortDescription: First Lady Melania Trump received the White House Christmas tree on a horse drawn-carriage.

title: Trump accepts invitation from Xi to visit China in April
shortDescription: President Trump said he accepted an invitation from Chinese President Xi Jinping to visit China in April and invited Xi to the US for a state visit.

title: When will President Trump pardon a turkey? Details on the 2025 event
shortDescription: The annual presidential turkey pardon will this year include birds named Gobble and Waddle. Here's what to know about the event.

title: Judge tosses cases against Trump targets James Comey and Letitia James
shortDescription: A judge ordered that charges against Trump targets, James Comey and Letitia James, be dismissed because the prosecutor was unlawfully appointed.

title: Cash is king: bipartisan bill seeks to preserve cash payment rights
shortDescription: A bipartisan bill seeks to require businesses to accept cash payments under $500 and ban extra fees for using cash.

title: Petition calls for creation of Trump County, Florida. What to know
shortDescription: A Florida woman's petition calls for a new Trump County along the Sunshine State's northeast coast. It'd be Florida's first new county in 100 years.

title: Watch live: Melania Trump welcomes White House Christmas Tree
shortDescription: The arrival of the huge concolor fir marks the 59th year of a Christmas tradition.

title: White House Christmas tree arrives. Will Barron Trump be there?
shortDescription: Melania Trump welcomes official White House Christmas tree. Barron Trump joined her for this in 2017. A look at some past Christmas controversies.

title: Trump plan for Obamacare on hold after GOP pushback
shortDescription: Trump was expected to unveil a health care proposal that included extending Obamacare subsidies for two years. Now it's off, according to reports.

title: Michigan grew the White House Christmas tree for first time in 40 years
shortDescription: The official Christmas tree that will adorn the White House in 2025 was provided by Korson's Tree Farms. Here's what to know about the Michigan farm.
